text.textblock: In accordance with the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 and the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission's (Commission's) regulations, 18 CFR part 380 (Order No. 486, 52 FR 47897), the Office of Hydropower Licensing has reviewed the application for a new license for the existing Oconto Falls Hydroelectric Project located on the Oconto River in Oconto County, near the City of Oconto Falls, Wisconsin, and has prepared a draft Environmental Assessment (EA) for the project.
Copies of the draft EA are available for review in the Public Reference Branch, Room 3308, of the Commission's offices at 941 North Capitol Street, NE., Washington, DC 20426.

Comments should be filed within 30 days from the date of this notice and should be addressed to Lois D. Cashell, Secretary, Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, 825 North Capitol Street, NE., Washington, DC 20426. Please affix Project No. 2689-001 to all comments. For further information, please contact Mr. Ed Lee, Project Manager, at (202) 219-2809.

doctitle.textblock: Scott Paper Company; Availability of Draft Environmental Assessment
